_header: Jesu doth him bemean / and speaketh to sinful man
_description: Appeal of Christ to Man — forty lines in irregular stanzas

Bod416.First Lines:
Ihesus doþ him bymene and spekeþ to synful
                    mon…
Bod416.Last Lines:
…heuene blisse y shal ȝeue þe  þat lasteþ
                    ay & oo
Bod416.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XIV Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1924. 2nd ed., rev.: G. V. Smithers, Oxford,
            1952: 225-6.
Davies,  Reginald Thorne. 
             Medieval English Lyrics: a critical anthology.
         London, 1963; Evanston, IL: Northwestern UP, 1964: 152-3.
